titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CDS REPORT PERIOD START DATE - Description

div.p: CDS REPORT PERIOD START DATE defines the Start Date (for the date range of the data being exchanged) for the Bulk Replacement Update time period.

Usage: CDS REPORT PERIOD START DATE is a mandatory data item when the Commissioning Data Set Bulk Replacement Update Mechanism is used. It is not required when the Commissioning Data Set Net Change Update Mechanism is used. The CDS REPORT PERIOD START DATE must be a valid date and cannot be after the CDS REPORT PERIOD END DATE.
See the supporting information in the Commissioning Data Set Submission Protocol for further details.
